Convert to Turborepo monorepo with Expo mobile app

Monorepo structure:
- apps/web: Next.js web application \(moved from root\)
- apps/mobile: New Expo React Native app
- packages/shared: Shared types, constants, and utilities

Mobile app features:
- Home screen with house list and stats
- Camera screen for capturing construction photos
- House detail screen with progress and timeline
- Expo Router for navigation
- Supabase integration

Shared package includes:
- Database TypeScript types
- Construction phases constants
- Status color and label utilities

Tooling:
- Turborepo for monorepo management
- npm workspaces
- Shared TypeScript configuration

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
